text:
Perfect! I have successfully changed all occurrences of "VisibleDx" to "InvisibleDx" throughout the entire application. Here's a summary of what was updated:

## **✅ Complete Name Change: VisibleDx → InvisibleDx**

### **Files Updated:**

**Translation Files (3 files):**
- `lib/translations/en.ts` - English translations
- `lib/translations/nl.ts` - Dutch translations  
- `lib/translations/da.ts` - Danish translations

**Components (3 files):**
- `components/navigation.tsx` - Menu title
- `components/disclaimer.tsx` - Footer and GitHub link
- `components/help-system.tsx` - Help documentation

**App Pages (3 files):**
- `app/layout.tsx` - Page title metadata
- `app/new-patient/page.tsx` - SOAP note headers
- `app/criteria-engine/page.tsx` - Report headers

**Documentation & Config (2 files):**
- `LICENSE` - GitHub repository URL
- `MULTILINGUAL_README.md` - Documentation

### **Key Changes Made:**
- **App titles**: All page titles now show "InvisibleDx"
- **Navigation**: Menu header updated
- **Reports**: SOAP notes and clinical reports reference InvisibleDx
- **GitHub links**: Updated to point to InvisibleDx repository
- **Documentation**: All references in help system and README
- **Footer**: Brand name in footer updated
- **Multilingual**: Consistent across all 3 supported languages

### **Verification:**
- ✅ **Build successful**: No TypeScript errors or build issues
- ✅ **Complete coverage**: All 31 references found and updated
- ✅ **No orphaned references**: Search confirms no "VisibleDx" remains

The application is now fully rebranded as **InvisibleDx** and ready for use with the new name consistently applied across all user-facing text, documentation, and technical references.
